Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    Settings.SettingsProperties.'Break Down by Categories',
    ThisItem.ID  = 1,
    false)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
[
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting1",
        Category: "Theme",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "True",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit,
        Items: ["Hello", "World"]
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting2.1",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        Category: "Accessibility",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "False",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting2.2",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        Category: "Accessibility",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "False",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting2.3",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        Category: "Accessibility",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "False",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting3",
        Category: "Misc",
        Context: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.",
        'Input Type': "Text",
        'Default Value': "True",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting4",
        Category: "Misc",
        Context: "This is a selection",
        'Input Type': "Selection",
        Items: ["Hello", "World"],
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    }]

ForAll(
    galFields.AllItems,
    {
        'Field Name': ThisRecord.'Field Name',
        'New Value': Text(Switch(
                        ThisRecord.'Input Type',
                        "Toggle",
                            ThisRecord.tglInput.Value,
                        "Text",
                            ThisRecord.txtInput.Text,
                        "Selection",
                            ThisRecord.dd_Input.Selected.Value))
    })

Rules.InvariantScript:
[
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting1",
        Category: "Theme",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "True",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting2.1",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        Category: "Accessibility",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "False",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting2.2",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        Category: "Accessibility",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "False",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting2.3",
        Context: "This is a setting",
        Category: "Accessibility",
        'Input Type': "Toggle",
        'Default Value': "False",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting3",
        Category: "Misc",
        Context: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.",
        'Input Type': "Text",
        'Default Value': "True",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit
    },
    {
        'Field Name': "Setting3",
        Category: "Misc",
        Context: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.",
        'Input Type': "Selection",
        'Default Value': "True",
        'Display Mode': DisplayMode.Edit,
        Items: ["Hello", "World"]
    }]

ForAll(
    galFields.AllItems,
    {
        'Field Name': ThisRecord.'Field Name',
        'New Value': Switch(
                        ThisRecord.'Input Type',
                        "Toggle",
                            Text(ThisRecord.tglInput.Value),
                        "Text",
                            ThisRecord.txtInput.Text,
                        "Selection",
                            ThisRecord.dd_Input.Selected.Value)
    })

ComponentExtraMetadata.ComponentDescription: Settings Menu with Toggles, Text Inputs and Drop Downs

ComponentManifest.Description: Settings Menu with Toggles, Text Inputs and Drop Downs
ComponentManifest.Name: Settings

CustomProperties.Name: UseModernTheming
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Toggle between Modern Theming Colours and Defined Colour Scheme in Properties
